Water vapor , water vapour or aqueous vapor is the gaseous phase of water .
Clouds consist of microscopic droplets of liquid water -LRB- warm clouds -RRB- , tiny crystals of ice -LRB- cold clouds -RRB- , or both -LRB- mixed phase clouds -RRB- .
Cloud droplets initially form by the condensation of water vapor onto condensation nuclei when the supersaturation of air exceeds a critical value according to Köhler theory .

Saratoga Township may refer to one of the following places in the United States :   Saratoga Township , Howard County , Arkansas  Saratoga Township , Grundy County , Illinois  Saratoga Township , Marshall County , Illinois  Saratoga Township , Howard County , Iowa  Saratoga Township , Winona County , Minnesota  Saratoga Township , Holt County , Nebraska  Saratoga Township , Wilson County , North Carolina  Saratoga Township , LaMoure County , North Dakota  Saratoga Township , Faulk County , South Dakota   See also   Saratoga -LRB- disambiguation -RRB-   Category : Township name disambiguation pages
Across the street from the Rectory for over seventy years was the famous `` Rennert Hotel '' on the southeastern corner of Saratoga with Cethedral-Liberty Streets .
Saratoga is located on the eastern border of the county and is located east of Saratoga Springs , and is bordered by Saratoga Lake and the Hudson River .
